attributes.action:
National Referendum on Digital ID

the  people should have their say on this
attributes.additional_details: put it to  the people National Referendum on Digital ID
attributes.background: the  people should have their say Yes or NO  this is not important for MP's you vote on when it effects every person in this Country

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
